articles.title: 'Family of Haqqani Sahib part of Islamic Emirate': Taliban oppose US blacklist - Hindustan Times
articles.description: US blacklist: Such positions are detrimental for America, the Taliban said terming these as a ‘repetition of past failed experiments’. | World News
articles.content: The Taliban objected to the recent statement issued by the United States expressing concern over the blacklisted status of many members of the Taliban's newly formed government and said such position… [+2553 chars]

articles.author: Reuters, Keith Griffith
articles.title: Taliban AGREE to let 200 Americans and foreigners fly out of Kabul - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Taliban were pressed to allow the departures by U.S. Special Representative Zalmay Khalilzad, said the official, who spoke to Reuters on condition of anonymity on Thursday.
articles.content:
Taliban authorities have agreed to let 200 American civilians and other non-Afghans to depart on charter flights from Kabul airport, a U.S. official said.
